空间的；存在于空间的；占地位的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 源于希腊语，指和谐的有秩序的宇宙，与chaos(天地开辟前的浑沌状态)相对。
指大气层或太阳系之外的极高的天空，即太空之意。
指包括地球及其他天体的广大空间。

word_group.brief_definition: 私人空间；个人空间；私人场所；个人时间；私人时间

公共场所；公共空间；银行营业厅

bilingual.target: 给他们更多的个人空间。

bilingual.source: My school has lots of green space.
bilingual.target: 我的学校有很多绿色空间。

bilingual.source: There was not enough living space for people.
Leave plenty of space for your answers.
bilingual.target: 为你的回答留出足够的空间。

bilingual.source: There is not enough space for so many people.
bilingual.target: 没有足够的空间容纳这么多人。

bilingual.source: The circular space where circus performers do their acts.
bilingual.target: 马戏表演者进行表演的圆形空间。

bilingual.source: They'll even send you a sign for your special space.
bilingual.target: 他们甚至会给你寄一个标志用于你的特殊空间。

bilingual.source: But in cities, limited space has led to people looking for new solutions.
bilingual.target: 但在城市里，有限的空间导致人们寻找新的解决方案。

bilingual.source: Those without outside space can rent small pieces of land on which to grow things.
bilingual.target: 没有外部空间的人可以租用小块土地来种植东西。

bilingual.source: For an outdoor garden, you will also need to see how much sunlight the space gets.
bilingual.target: 对于户外花园，你还需要看看这个空间能得到多少阳光。

list.abstract: 一般理解为空间。引申义为空格、太空等。
Space，男，韩国人。是游戏魔兽争霸的电子竞技中的一名传奇残疾选手。Space从小就患有肌肉失调症，但即便这样，他还是通过自己的努力拿下多项冠军。 Space在2013年5月6日凌晨逝世，年仅23岁。被玩家尊称为“意志亡灵”。2013年5月9日暴雪为他发布了悼文。

yingyinNormal.en: The Wormhole is a three-dimensional hole in space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虫洞是空间里的三维洞。

yingyinNormal.en: Space. Reality. Power. Soul. Mind. And Time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 空间。现实。力量。灵魂。心灵。还有时间。

yingyinNormal.en: The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绝不能让霸天虎知道空间桥在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: Deep, deep space gives you a very, very fresh approach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 深邃的宇宙空间给了你非常非常新鲜的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Now they are building their own space station.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而如今，他们正在建立他们自己的空间站。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack, we can't have a dog. There's not enough room, space there's not enough space, with the barking and the scratching.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，我们不能养狗，这里的房间，空间，这里空间不够，它还会乱嚎乱抓。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I didn't mean anything by it. It just seemed like you needed some space, so I gave it to you. I get it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没别的意思，你看上去需要一点个人空间，所以我给你空间。我懂的。

yingyinNormal.en: But, you know when you want to go to sleep, you want some space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过当你想睡觉时，你会想要一点空间。

yingyinNormal.en: She's working through some things and she needs her own space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在努力弄明白一些事情，而且她需要自己的空间。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes! Yes! See? Easy. And look at all this cargo space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开了！看到没？轻而易举。看看这宽敞的后备箱空间。

yingyinNormal.en: So the Wormhole almost feels like a crystal ball hanging in space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，虫洞差不多感觉就像一个水晶球悬浮于空间。

yingyinNormal.en: It's supposed to be from a different planet in outer space! Here we go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是从外层空间的另一个星球来的。我们开始吧！

yingyinNormal.en: I had this space designed for open energy and open conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我设计这个空间就是让大家有开放的能量，以及开放性的交流。

yingyinNormal.en: Essentially. There's a tremendous amount of unused space in copper power lines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本质上是的，铜质输电线路中存在庞大的未用空间。

yingyinNormal.en: A Wormhole is a particular way that space and time can be curved. It's like adding a little tube that connects two parts of space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虫洞是时空可以弯曲的特殊途径。这就像加上一个连接空间两部分的小隧道。

yingyinNormal.en: I started SpaceX with the idea of trying to revolutionize space transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱有试图改革空间运输的想法，我开创了SpaceX公司。

yingyinNormal.en: It defied your laws of physics, to transport matter through time and space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这打破了你们的物理学定理，物质一定要通过时间空间传输。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, just give her some space, all right? Don't call, don't text, don't e-mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给她一点空间就行了？别打电话，别发短信，别发邮件。

yingyinNormal.en: They have access to infinite time and space, but they're not bound by anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们能通往无尽的时间和空间，但他们与现在没有任何联系。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the ability to reshape the universe. Together the pillars form a space bridge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它具有重塑宇宙的能力，集结所有传送柱就能形成空间桥。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地方; 空间; 空地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a distance, area, or volume that can be measured
sense_info_list.zh: 地方; 空间; 空地

examination_example.sentence: It's also a good idea to delay the conversation if you are in a meeting or other public <highlight>space</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在会议或其他公共场所，推迟谈话也是个好主意。

examination_example.sentence: But successive governments have presided over selling green <highlight>spaces</highlight>, squeezing money from local authorities and declining attention on sport in education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但历届政府都在出售绿地，从地方当局那里榨取资金，并减少了对体育教育的关注。

examination_example.sentence: It was specifically to provide city dwellers with <highlight>spaces</highlight> for leisure where they could experience "a refreshing air."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是专门为城市居民提供休闲空间，让他们可以体验“清新的空气”。

sense_info_list.en: the region beyond the earth's atmosphere
the part of a line, page or document that is empty

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地方; 空间; 空地; 场地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 空间；空地；篇幅；一段时间；线间；间隔；空格；空铅；线间空白；期间

sense_info_list.en: the region beyond the earth's atmosphere

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about Goddard's idea of using rockets for <highlight>space</highlight> exploration?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于Goddard的使用火箭进行太空探索的想法，我们了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: In January 1920, the New York Times ridiculed Goddard's theory that rockets could be utilized for <highlight>space</highlight> exploration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1920年1月，《纽约时报》嘲笑Goddard关于火箭可以用于太空探索的理论。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a distance, area, or volume that can be measured
sense_info_list.zh: 地方; 空间; 空地; 场地

examination_example.sentence: And for more than a decade, the web created an alternative <highlight>space</highlight> that threatened television's grip on society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而十多年来，网络创造了一个替代空间，这个替代空间威胁着电视对社会的控制。

examination_example.sentence: They are bent on looking for an alternative <highlight>space</highlight> for escape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们一心想寻找另一个逃跑的地方。

examination_example.sentence: They are useful in comparing cultural values across time and <highlight>space</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们有助于跨时间和空间地比较文化价值观。

word_usage.usage:
space指“星际之间的空间/太空”时，只用单数形式，其前不用冠词。
示例：Scientists have received many messages from space.
科学家们收到了许多来自太空的信息。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the region beyond the earth's atmosphere

examination_example.sentence: A pair of entrepreneurs are planning to build and launch a spacecraft that would carry and roast coffee beans in outer <highlight>space</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一对企业家正计划建造和发射一个可以在外太空携带和烘焙咖啡豆的航天器。

examination_example.sentence: They charged a high price for their <highlight>space</highlight>-roasted coffee beans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的太空烘焙的咖啡豆要价很高。

examination_example.sentence: They collaborated on building the first <highlight>space</highlight> coffee machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们合作制作了第一台太空咖啡机。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a distance; area; or volume that can be measured
sense_info_list.zh: 地方; 空间; 空地; 场地

examination_example.sentence: People occupy valuable table <highlight>space</highlight> in quiet times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们会在安静的时候占用宝贵的餐桌空间。

examination_example.sentence: While remote workers help to keep the café full in quiet times, they can take up the valuable table <highlight>space</highlight> in busy periods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然远程工作的人有助于保持咖啡馆在清闲时满座，但他们也会在忙碌时段占用宝贵的餐桌空间。

examination_example.sentence: What would we think of a person who invades our personal <highlight>space</highlight> according to the author?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据作者的说法，我们会如何看待一个侵犯我们个人空间的人？

word_usage.usage:
space指“星际之间的空间/太空”时，只用单数形式，其前不用冠词。
示例：Scientists have received many messages from space.
科学家们收到了许多来自太空的信息。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a distance, area, or volume that can be measured

examination_example.sentence: After all, coworking <highlight>spaces</highlight> also typically use an open office layout (布局).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，共同工作空间通常也采用开放式办公室布局。

examination_example.sentence: Many visitors were amazed by the complex architectural <highlight>space</highlight> and abundant building types.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 复杂的建筑空间和丰富的建筑类型令许多游客惊叹不已。

examination_example.sentence: A grasp of how to manage color in your <highlight>spaces</highlight> is one of the first steps to creating rooms you'll love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 掌握如何管理空间色彩是创建您喜欢的房间的第一步。

sense_info_list.en: the region beyond the earth's atmosphere

examination_example.sentence: The microorganisms (微生物) from our bodies grow uncontrollably on surfaces of the International <highlight>Space</highlight> Station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人体内的微生物在国际空间站的表面上不受控制地生长。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地方; 空间; 空地; 场地

sense_info_list.en: the region beyond the earth's atmosphere

examination_example.sentence: They have been taken to and brought back from outer <highlight>space</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被带到外太空，又从外太空带回来。

examination_example.sentence: People needn't worry, because <highlight>space</highlight> vegetables are actually very healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们不必担心，因为太空蔬菜其实很健康。

examination_example.sentence: With the help of the telescope, we can receive weaker and more radio messages far away in <highlight>space</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在望远镜的帮助下，我们可以在遥远的太空中接收到更弱、更多的无线电信息。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a distance, area, or volume that can be measured
sense_info_list.zh: 地方; 空间; 空地; 场地

examination_example.sentence: A community park should have open <highlight>spaces</highlight> for everyone to use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社区公园应该有开放的空间供每个人使用。

examination_example.sentence: Every day there is less and less <highlight>space</highlight> on Earth for rubbish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地球上的可以处理垃圾的空间每天都在减少。

examination_example.sentence: Some primary schoolchildren have been raised in homes with more green <highlight>space</highlight> around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些小学生是在周围有更多绿地的家庭中长大的。

word_usage.usage:
space指“星际之间的空间/太空”时，只用单数形式，其前不用冠词。
示例：Scientists have received many messages from space.
科学家们收到了许多来自太空的信息。
